dict.acceptation: 属于；是…的成员；应被放在；适应；

sent.orig: I want somebody to belong to and somebody to belong to me.
sent.trans: 我渴望属于一个人，也渴望这个人属于我。

sent.orig: Women belong at home, while men belong in the fields.
sent.trans: 女人适合留在家里，而男人适合走上战场。

sent.orig: Mineral resources belong to property in kind and mining rights belong to thing right.
sent.trans: 矿产资源属于实物性财产，矿权属于物权。

sent.orig: They do not belong to the world any more than I belong to the world.
sent.trans: 他们不属于世界，就如我不属于世界一样。

sent.orig: Unexpectedly suddenly a year, back to the place, as I already not belong there.
sent.trans: 没想到转眼间有快过了一年，回到以前的地方，好像我已不属于那里了。
